The elusive Satoshi left a contract signed with a rare low-exponent RSA scheme. Crack the signature to reveal the secret. Encrypted signature: 0x277cf2e6c61bf4bf5322b029dadecebaa6f804cc3f46c68d2c0e71740fbd22f92d344d4d7e03e03bfd21f7dd993d5fbe77cb3e39bd41c067975e7a55745d1274

## Challenge Technical Details

hint: What happens when you cube small numbers? Remember e=3!
